summary.overview: The AI initiated a call to understand the user's primary concerns. The user immediately highlighted the significant problem of unpayable agricultural loans due to high interest rates. The AI acknowledged this issue and assured the user of ongoing efforts to address loan interest rates.
summary.user_tone: burdened and direct, with a hint of impatience

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Namaskar Bhaiya, hum Sunita Devi bol at hain, Rajesh Verma ji ke taraf se. Kaise hain aap? Aapke yahan kaun si problem sabse badi ba? Rozgar, baadh, ya kuchh aur? Hum sunat hain.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Haan ji, aapka yeh chinta bilkul sahi ba. Kisan Bhaiya log ke samne yeh bahut bada problem ba. Verma ji aap jaisan Kisan Bhaiya ke liye bahut kaam karat hain. Unhone Makhana

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Hum ee bolat hain ki Verma ji ne aapke liye Makhana Board banwaya hai, aur kisan log ke liye ₹2000 crore ke projects laaye hain. Jisse aapke kheti mein fayda ho sake. Aapka jo loan problem hai, usko bhi woh dekhat hain. Aap bataiye, aapke khet mein kaun si fasal hoti hai?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Achha theek ba. Bajra ke kisan log ke liye bhi Verma ji ne bahut kuchh kail ba. Unka jo vision hai, woh kisan log ke aamdani badhawe ke liye hai. Aap bataiye, agar Verma ji phir se jeet jatein hain, toh aapke mann mein ka ummeed ba?

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Yahan par sabse badi samasya toh yeh hai ki kheti karte hue kisan ka karz maaf hi nahin ho pata. Byaj itna adhik hai ki hum chuka hi nahin pate. Boliye, kya bol rahe ho? Hamare khet mein hum bajra ugate hain.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Haan Bhaiya, aapka yeh baat bilkul sahi ba. Hum samajh sakat hain. Verma ji kisanon ke liye interest rate kam karwane par zaroor

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Haan, Verma ji aapke loan par jo interest rate ba, usko kam karwane par bilkul dhyan de rahat hain. Unka poora koshish ba ki kisan log ke samasya kam ho sake aur woh apne kheti par dhyan de sakain. Aap bataiye, aapke khet mein paani ke વ્યવસ્થા kaisi ba?
